author: rwesten
msg: fixes STANBOL-71 changed the Solr configuration to create the index used for the unit tests in "target/data/test" (this is relative to the working directory of the pom.xml of the SolrYard

author: rwesten
msg: - /query requests that allow to parsed JSON serialised FieldQuery requests
see the updated README.TXT for details
In addition the SolrYard now also replaces ' ' with '+' for Wildcard constraints (this brings it in line with a similar change for Equals requests.
